xgpiops_sinit.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This file contains the implementation of the XGpioPs driver's static initialization functionality.

Note:
None.


 MODIFICATION HISTORY:


 Ver   Who  Date     Changes
 ----- ---- -------- -----------------------------------------------
 1.00a sv   01/15/10 First Release
 
 


#include "xparameters.h"

#include "xgpiops.h"







Functions


XGpioPs_Config * XGpioPs_LookupConfig (u16 DeviceId)




Variables


XGpioPs_Config XGpioPs_ConfigTable []





Function Documentation





  

    
      

        

          XGpioPs_Config* XGpioPs_LookupConfig           
          ( 
          u16 
           DeviceId          
           ) 
          
        

      

    		
  





  

    
       
    
    



This function looks for the device configuration based on the unique device ID. The table XGpioPs_ConfigTable[] contains the configuration information for each device in the system.


Parameters:

  

    
DeviceId is the unique device ID of the device being looked up.

  




Returns:
A pointer to the configuration table entry corresponding to the given device ID, or NULL if no match is found.


Note:
None. 

    		
  




Variable Documentation





  

    
      

        

          XGpioPs_Config XGpioPs_ConfigTable[]          
        

      

    		
  





  

    
       
    
    



This table contains configuration information for each GPIO device in the system.
